name: Virtua Pachi-Slot: Olympia Special
overview: Virtua Pachi-Slot Olympia Special is a pachi-slot (gambling machine) game that features a perfect recreation of 3 Olympia gambling machines (Funky Cat, Bee Kids Club & Ultra Kinta) with different levels of zoom. The game features also 2 different vs modes: againts the CPU or againts another human opponent, if the player wins the vs cpu mode a small video sequence of the girl that the player plays against will appear.
